# NSBrowserCell

**Class**

The user interface of a browser.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class NSBrowserCell
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBrowserCell] class is the subclass of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell] used by default to display data in the columns of an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBrowser] object. (Each column contains an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMatrix] object filled with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBrowserCell] objects.)

## Getting Browser Cell Information

- **branchImage**: Returns the default image for branch cells in a browser.
- **highlightedBranchImage**: Returns the default image for branch browser cells that are highlighted.

## Configuring Browser Cells

- **image**: The browser cell’s image.
- **alternateImage**: The browser cell’s image for the highlighted state.

## Managing Browser Cell State

- **reset()**: Unhighlights the receiver and unsets its state.
- **set()**: Highlights the receiver and sets its state.
- **isLeaf**: A Boolean that indicates whether the browser cell is a leaf or a branch cell.
- **isLoaded**: A Boolean that indicates whether the cell is ready to display.
- **highlightColor(in:)**: Returns the highlight color that the receiver wants to display.

## Initializers

- **init(coder:)**
- **init(imageCell:)**
- **init(textCell:)**

## Inherits From

- NSCell

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSAccessibilityElementProtocol
- NSAccessibilityProtocol
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSUserInterfaceItemIdentification
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
